oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Confederate veteran Robert Frederick Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Johnson served in Co. I, 48th Inf. Regt. CSA as a sergeant. He is pictured wearing a United Confederate Veterans (UCV) ribbon of the Hiram S. Bradford Bivouac, Camp 426, of Brownsville (Tenn." He hosted the annual local UCV reunions on his farm near Brownsville. He is pictured in a civilian, possibly veteran's, frock coat and hat, wearing a Southern Cross medal in addition to the ribbon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Frederick Johnson, Robert
